title: Boston Bruins ' revenue 2005 to 2019
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2013/14, and lastly roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2016/17.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012/13 and 2013/14.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 176.0 was reported at Year 2016/17
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 114.0 was reported at Year 2012/13
